info.name: Joemonster Alpha
info.description: Poprawki do wyglądu Joemonster - wersja *bardzo* testowa.

style.css:
/*Restorn*/
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("joemonster.org"){font[face=arial]{background:#00f}body{-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;text-shadow:.5px .5px .5px rgba(0,0,0,.1)}A,A:link{text-decoration:none}H2{background-image:none;padding-left:0}a{color:#000;transition:color .5s,background-color .5s,border .5s}a:hover{transition:color .2s,background-color .2s,border .2s}IMG{border-color:transparent}.systemMessage{padding-top:10px}#rg45,.BoxContent>table>tbody>tr>td[align=center],.GoogleActiveViewClass,.adsbygoogle,.widget_social.side,div[id^=BF_WIDGET],div[id^=bmone]{display:none}.ncWidget .ncwArticles td.ncwAd1:before{position:absolute;content:'Blocked';color:#d3d3d3;background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);width:153px;height:164px;pointer-events:auto}.ncwLogo{display:none!important}div[style="position: fixed;bottom: 0;width: 1020px;height: 100px;background-color: #eee;border: 1px solid black;z-index: 1000;overflow: auto;left: 50%;margin-left: -510px;border-bottom: 0;"]{display:none}#mtvDescription{font-size:11pt}.minigame>a>img{max-width:270px}#skoczek,.SZmenu{display:none}#galeriabox{margin:0;padding:0}#galeriabox img{width:100px;height:70px;margin:0;transition:all .2s ease 0s}#galeriabox a:hover img{box-shadow:0 0 10px 2px #000;transform:scale(1.4);transition:all .5s ease .1s}.hashid-picture{max-height:1000px!important;padding:4px;border:1px solid #FFD800;background-color:#FFF1A8;border-radius:4px}img[class=hashid-picture]{border-radius:10px}#hashid-tooltip{max-height:1000px!important;overflow:visible;background:0 0;border:0 transparent}.small{padding:5px}.more:hover{border:1px solid orange}#userbox A{text-decoration:none}#userMiniMenu{right:12px}#userbox{margin-right:12px}#polecMenu UL{border:0 solid transparent;box-shadow:0 0 10px 2px #323232;top:25px}#googlecse>input[type=submit]{text-shadow:-1px -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);font-weight:700;color:#FFF;background:red;border:0;height:28px;padding:5px;font-size:14px!important;border-top-right-radius:8px;border-bottom-right-radius:8px;background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#f62b2b,#d20202) red;transition:1s all .5s ease}#googlecse>input[type=submit]:hover{background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#e40a0a,#9f0202)}#googlecse>input[type=submit]:active{background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#a40a0a,#9f0202)}#googlecse>input[type=text]{height:28px;padding-left:4px!important;font-size:14px!important;margin-right:-2px!important;border-top-left-radius:8px;border-bottom-left-radius:8px;width:190px}#polecMenu UL LI{border:0 solid transparent}#menuJM2 LI A.men{padding:5px 11px 4px}#menuJM2 UL UL{width:98%}#menuJM2{border-bottom-left-radius:5px;border-bottom-right-radius:5px;border-top:1px solid #FFED86}#menuJM2 UL UL LI{background:0 0}.menuJMunselected ul[style="padding-left:120px"]{padding-left:50px!important}.mtvHome{transition:all .5s ease 0s;z-index:0}.mtvHome:hover{box-shadow:0 5px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.98);transform:translateY(-6px);z-index:9999}.mtvIMG:hover{opacity:1}#lewa_glowna,#prawa_glowna{margin:0!important}#mt0{margin-top:0!important}.BoxTitle:nth-child(1){border-top-left-radius:5px;border-top-right-radius:5px}#menuJM2 LI A.men{font-size:13px;letter-spacing:0}#podoba #link SPAN{font:700 11px arial}.commentHeader{border-radius:4px}.commentAvatar img{border-radius:2px}#commentsFormContainer{background-color:rgba(150,150,150,.05)!important;margin-bottom:20px;margin-left:5px;padding-bottom:5px;border-bottom-left-radius:5px;border-bottom-right-radius:5px}.commentBox{background-color:rgba(150,150,150,0)!important;padding:10px 5px 5px}.comDisabled{background-color:rgba(255,50,50,.2)!important}.commentBox,.commentBox_reply{transition:all 2s ease}#mtv_main{width:670px}object[width="620"]>embed[width="620"]{width:500px!important;margin:5px}.commentBox_reply{padding:5px 5px 20px 7px;margin-left:80px;box-shadow:-10px -10px 30px -7px silver}.comment-more-replies{margin:19px 0 15px 80px;color:#666;box-shadow:0 0 10px 0 #d3d3d3;padding:2px;background:#fff}.comment-more-replies a{text-decoration:underline}.zobaczThumb{overflow:unset}.pl{background:none!important}#mtv-poczekalnia-header{height:30px;border-radius:6px;border-bottom:1px solid #d3d3d3}.podobne.poczekalnia.show{top:90px;left:28px}#player1[style="display: inline-block; width: 600px; height: 400px; float: left;"]{margin-left:20px}#mtv_main_swf{padding-top:10px}div#main{border-radius:5px;margin-top:15px}#mtv_right{text-align:left;padding:5px;float:right;width:350px;margin-top:118px}.separator{height:0}.BoxContent:nth-child(9),.BoxTitle:nth-child(8){display:none}userContainer{border:0 transparent}html>body #forum_list TD{border-bottom:0 transparent}tr[class=phorumTableHeader]>td[width="300"]:nth-child(2),tr[class=phorumTableHeader]>td[width="350"]{width:420px!important}tr[height="20"]>td{padding:3px 0}#phorum-feed .phorum-post-title{max-width:420px;padding:5px 0}.phorum_post td{padding-top:20px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.1)}#forumLeft{width:795px;margin:0 10px}#forumRight{padding-top:40px}#forumFora LI{border:0 transparent}#forumFora LI A{padding:3px 2px 3px 10px}.sygnaturka>IMG,.sygnaturka>a>IMG,.sygnaturka>center>a>IMG{display:none}.postBox{padding:0}.postContent{padding:8px 12px}.postHeader{padding:5px;background:rgba(100,100,100,.1)}#rejform1{background:0 0;border:5px solid rgba(242,242,242,1);border-radius:20px}#rejform2{display:none}center[style="font-size:11px"]{margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:2px}.yel{background-color:transparent}#freeRejestracja{padding-top:10px}#user_right{border-bottom:2px solid #FFA900}#footer,#footer755{padding:10px;border-bottom-left-radius:5px;border-bottom-right-radius:5px;background:#EFEFEF}table[style]{border-color:#d3d3d3!important;border-width:1px!important}#linkiContainer{padding-top:10px;padding-left:20px;width:700px}.link-thumb{padding:4px;border:0 transparent}.linkItem{margin:4px}#blogMain{width:590px!important}#blogRightColumn{margin-left:5px!important}#search-params-action input{font-size:14px;height:28px;margin-right:-5px;border-radius:8px 0 0 8px;border:1px solid rgba(170,170,170,1)!important}#search-params-action button[type=submit]{text-shadow:-1px -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);font-weight:700;color:#FFF;background:red;border:0;height:28px;padding:5px;font-size:14px!important;border-top-right-radius:8px;border-bottom-right-radius:8px;background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#f62b2b,#d20202) red}#search-params-action button[type=submit]:hover{background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#e40a0a,#9f0202)}#search-params-action button[type=submit]:active{background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#a40a0a,#9f0202)}#search-params-action select{margin-right:-5px}.thumbnails{background:0 0}#kolejkadiv{margin:6px 0}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/filmy(|/najnowsze|/ulubione|/najpopularniejsze)'){#footer{margin-left:-5px!important}div[style="float:left;width:630px; position: relative"]{width:680px!important;padding-left:15px!important}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/filmy/[0-9].*'){#title,.title,a.title,a.title:hover{margin-left:104px}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/gry'){#footer{margin-left:-5px!important}div[style="float:left;width:630px; position: relative"]{width:670px!important;padding-left:15px!important}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/blog(|/)'){div[style="line-height:130%"] img{max-width:590px}div[style="line-height:130%"] img[align]{max-height:50px}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/(?!blog/).*'),regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/blog(|/|/kat)'){body{background:gray!important}hr{border-color:rgba(0,0,0,.15)}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/phorum.*'){table[width="500"]{width:795px!important}textarea[id=postform]{width:785px!important;height:250px!important}td[bgcolor="#FFFFFF"]>input[type=Text]{width:718px!important}}@-moz-document regexp('http*://joemonster\\.org/embtv.*'){body{background:#000!important}}
